trans-unit.source: Sets the position within the current stream.
trans-unit.target: Sets the position within the current stream.

trans-unit.source: A byte offset relative to the origin parameter.
trans-unit.target: A byte offset relative to the origin parameter.

trans-unit.source: A value of type System.IO.SeekOrigin indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.
trans-unit.target: A value of type System.IO.SeekOrigin indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.

trans-unit.source: The new position within the current stream.
trans-unit.target: The new position within the current stream.

trans-unit.source: Thrown if <parameterReference>offset</parameterReference> is invalid for SeekOrigin.
trans-unit.target: Thrown if <parameterReference>offset</parameterReference> is invalid for SeekOrigin.
